meanings.definition: A sock that covers the lower part of the leg, typically reaching up to the knee.
meanings.sent1: I wore a cozy kneesock to keep my leg warm.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of kneesocks for her school uniform.
meanings.sent3: The kneesock danced off the shelf and onto my foot!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a colorful kneesock brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant kneesock had stripes of all colors, making it stand out.

meanings.definition: To wear or put on a knee-length sock.
meanings.sent1: I kneesock every morning before heading out.
meanings.sent2: He kneesocks with his sneakers for basketball practice.
meanings.sent3: She kneesocks quickly before the race starts.
meanings.sent4: The music made her kneesock with joy on the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: They kneesock carefully to avoid any wrinkles in the fabric.
